content: sts on hold for instep - ssk row 1 ws sl1 wyif p29 31 33 row 2 rs sl1 wyib k1 to last st k1 - k2tog work these 2 row 13 14 15 more times then work row 1 once more turn heel row 1 rs sl1 wyib k16 16 18 ssk k1 turn left sock insert chart row 2 ws sl1 wyif p5 7 5 p2tog p1 turn row 3 sl1 wyib k to 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn row 4 sl1 wyif p to 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn repeat row 3 and 4 until all sts have been worked 18 20 22 heel sts remain gusset set-up round sl1 k17 19 21 pick up and knit 16 17 18 sts along edge of heel flap place marker 1 work 30 32 34 instep sts continuing insert pattern as established place marker 2 pick up and knit 16 17 18 sts down side of heel flap knit to marker 1 marker 1 is now the start of the round www boo-biloo blogspot co uk round 1 work 30 32 34 instep sts continuing insert pattern as established slip marker 2 k1 ssk knit until 3 stitches before marker 1 k2tog k1 round 2 work 30 32 34 instep sts continuing insert pattern as established knit to end of round repeat these 2 rounds until 60 64 68 sts remain 30 32 34 each on instep and sole leave markers in position to use when shaping toe foot continue working evenly in pattern as set until foot measures approximately 21 23 25 cm from back of heel or 4cm/1½in less than the desired foot length ending with row 8 9 or 10 of pattern toe round 1 k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before marker 2 k2tog k1 slip marker k1 ssk knit until 3 sts remain k2tog k1 round 2 knit repeat these 2 rounds until 24 26 28 sts remain cut yarn leaving a 30cm/12in tail graft stitches together using kitchener stitch weave in ends copyright © louise crowther boo-biloo all rights reserved © this pattern including photos and items made from it are protected by copyright and intended for personal use only no part of this design or text may be reproduced copied translated or transmitted without permission purchasing downloading or printing this pattern constitutes agreement to these terms www boo-biloo blogspot co uk
